    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1185</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Kivunim: Maps and Directions in Tanakh1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kivunim: Karten und Richtungen in Tanakh1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Kivunim : Cartes et directions dans Tanakh1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Kivunim: Mapas e sentidos em Tanakh1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Kivunim: Programmi e sensi in Tanakh1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Kivunim: Χάρτες και κατευθύνσεις σε Tanakh1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Kivunim: Correspondencias y direcciones en 
Tanakh1</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">learners learn about maps and directions and apply that knowledge to a Biblical text.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">biblical text</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">maps</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anfänger erlernen über Karten und Richtungen und
wenden dieses Wissen an einem biblischen Text an.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants se renseignent sur des cartes et 
des directions et s'appliquent cette connaissance à un texte 
biblique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os learners aprendem sobre mapas e sentidos e 
aplicam esse conhecimento a um texto biblical.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">i principianti imparano circa i programmi ed i 
sensi ed applicano quella conoscenza ad un testo biblico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οι αρχάριοι μαθαίνουν για τους χάρτες και τις 
κατευθύνσεις και εφαρμόζουν εκείνη την γνώση σε ένα βιβλικό 
κείμενο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los principiantes aprenden sobre correspondencias 
y direcciones y aplican ese conocimiento a un texto bíblico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">biblischer Text</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Karten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">texte biblique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cartes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">texto biblical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mapas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">testo biblico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programmi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χάρτες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">texto bíblico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">correspondencias</string>
          </keyword>
